application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: Hurlingham Club Ranelagh GardensLondonSW6 3PR
description: T10148 - Turkey Oak fell and stump grind - tree in moribund condition; T10503 - Weeping Willow fell and stump grindT10644, T10645 & T10646 - Sycamores - Reduce height by 4 -5m, reduce sides by 2m to make the three trees into one large canopy. Remove deadwood throughout.T10376 - Poplar - large single stem overhanging footpath on lean. Fell due to H&S concerns	 T10309 & T10310 -London Plane, foreshore area. Reduce height by 10m and shape crowns to create one canopy. Remove all deadwood and massaria infected branches.T10330 & T10331 - Holm Oak, fells to hedge height - overhanging riverbank and causing damage to retaining wall		 T10328 - Ash reduction by 4m and lower limb removal over river to mitigate damage to retaining river defence wall T10005 - London Plane - Reduce four lowest limbs by up to 5m retaining furnishing growth, as subsiding. Install 6 tonne cable bracing on each limb; T10011- Sycamore fell and stump grind; T10812 - Cedar fell and stump grind	 T10819 - Cedar reduction - reduce extremities by up to 1.5m
